平面和球不稳定性简论

平面

控制方程和边界条件

假设流体层上下均为无旋流：

u⃗=∇ Φ\vec{u} = \nabla\ \Phi u=∇ Φ

Φ={Φ1Φ2\Phi = \begin{cases} \Phi_1 \\ \Phi_2 \end{cases} Φ={Φ1​Φ2​​

z=ζ(x,y,t)z = \zeta(x,y,t) z=ζ(x,y,t)

首先由连续性方程有：

1ρDρDt+∇⋅u⃗=0\frac{1}{\rho}\frac{D\rho}{Dt} + \nabla \cdot \vec{u} = 0 ρ1​DtDρ​+∇⋅u=0

因为不可压缩：

DρDt=0\frac{D\rho}{Dt} = 0 DtDρ​=0

因此有：

∇⋅u⃗=0Δ Φ1=0Δ Φ2=0\begin{alignat*}{3} \nabla \cdot \vec{u} &= 0\\ \mathrm{\Delta} ~ \Phi_{1}&= 0\\ \mathrm{\Delta} ~ \Phi_{2} &= 0 \end{alignat*} ∇⋅uΔ Φ1​Δ Φ2​​=0=0=0​

边界条件

周期性边界条件，默认 x 和 y 方向为周期性边界。
初始扰动可以假设发生在有限区域内，因此在所有时间里，扰动都是有界的（有限的）。
当

z→±∞，∇ Φ→Uz \to \pm \infty ，\nabla\ \Phi \rightarrow U z→±∞，∇ Φ→U

界面条件

界面上的流体粒子必须与界面一起移动：意味界面是连续的，没有滑移或分离。流体粒子始终保持在界面上。

两种流体不能在同一时间占据同一点，并且两种流体之间不能形成空腔：确保流体的物理完整性。流体不能相互穿透，并且界面必须保持连续，没有空隙。

界面法向速度=流体法向速度：

∂Φi∂z=∂Φi∂t+∂Φi∂x∂ζ∂x+∂Φi∂y∂ζ∂y\frac{\partial \Phi_{i}}{\partial z} = \frac{\partial \Phi_{i}}{\partial t} + \frac{\partial \Phi_{i}}{\partial x}\frac{\partial \zeta}{\partial x} + \frac{\partial \Phi_{i}}{\partial y}\frac{\partial \zeta}{\partial y} ∂z∂Φi​​=∂t∂Φi​​+∂x∂Φi​​∂x∂ζ​+∂y∂Φi​​∂y∂ζ​

压力在交界面上连续：

由伯努利方程:

∂Φi∂t+12(∇Φi)2−piρi+gz=Ci\frac{\partial \Phi_{i}}{\partial t} + \frac{1}{2} \left( \nabla\Phi_{i} \right)^{2} - \frac{p_{i}}{\rho_{i}} + gz = C_{i} ∂t∂Φi​​+21​(∇Φi​)2−ρi​pi​​+gz=Ci​

有：

ρ1{C1−12(∇Φ1)2−∂Φ1∂t−gz}=ρ2{C2−12(∇Φ2)2−∂Φ2∂t−gz}(z=ζ)\rho_{1}\{ C_{1} - \frac{1}{2}{(\nabla\Phi_{1})}^{2} - \frac{\partial\Phi_{1}}{\partial t} - gz\} = \rho_{2}\{ C_{2} - \frac{1}{2}{(\nabla\Phi_{2})}^{2} - \frac{\partial\Phi_{2}}{\partial t} - gz\} \quad (z=ζ) ρ1​{C1​−21​(∇Φ1​)2−∂t∂Φ1​​−gz}=ρ2​{C2​−21​(∇Φ2​)2−∂t∂Φ2​​−gz}(z=ζ)

初始时分无扰动：

ρ1{C1−12U12}=ρ2{C2−12U22}(z=0){\rho}_{1} \left\{ C_{1} - \frac{1}{2}{U_{1}}^{2} \right\} = \rho_{2}\left\{ C_{2} - \frac{1}{2}{U_{2}}^{2} \right\} \quad (z=0) ρ1​{C1​−21​U1​2}=ρ2​{C2​−21​U2​2}(z=0)

两式相减：

ρ1{12(∇Φ1)2−12U12+∂Φ1∂t+gz}=ρ2{12(∇Φ2)2−12U22+∂Φ2∂t+gz}\rho_{1}\{\frac{1}{2} \left( \nabla \Phi_{1} \right)^{2} - \frac{1}{2}{U_{1}}^{2} + \frac{\partial \Phi_{1}}{\partial t} + gz\} = \rho_{2}\{\frac{1}{2} {(\nabla\Phi_{2})}^{2} - \frac{1}{2} {U_{2}}^{2} + \frac{\partial \Phi_{2}}{\partial t} + gz\} ρ1​{21​(∇Φ1​)2−21​U1​2+∂t∂Φ1​​+gz}=ρ2​{21​(∇Φ2​)2−21​U2​2+∂t∂Φ2​​+gz}

完全耦合方程变为：

ΔΦ1=0，ΔΦ2=0\mathrm{\Delta} \Phi_{1} = 0，\mathrm{\Delta} \Phi_{2} = 0 ΔΦ1​=0，ΔΦ2​=0

当

z→±∞,∇ Φ→0z \to \pm \infty , \nabla\ \Phi \to 0 z→±∞,∇ Φ→0

∂Φi∂z=∂ζ∂t+∂Φi∂x∂ζ∂x+∂Φi∂y∂ζ∂y(z=ζ，i=1,2)\frac{\partial \Phi_{i}}{\partial z} = \frac{\partial \zeta}{\partial t} + \frac{\partial \Phi_{i}}{\partial x}\frac{\partial \zeta}{\partial x} + \frac{\partial \Phi_{i}}{\partial y}\frac{\partial \zeta}{\partial y} \quad (z = \zeta ，i = 1,2) ∂z∂Φi​​=∂t∂ζ​+∂x∂Φi​​∂x∂ζ​+∂y∂Φi​​∂y∂ζ​(z=ζ，i=1,2)

ρ1{12(∇Φ1)2−12U12+∂Φ1∂t+gz}=ρ2{12(∇Φ2)2−12U22+∂Φ2∂t+gz}\rho_{1} \{ \frac{1}{2} ( \nabla \Phi_{1} )^{2} - \frac{1}{2}{U_{1}}^{2} + \frac{\partial \Phi_{1}}{\partial t} + gz \} = \rho_{2}\{\frac{1}{2}{(\nabla\Phi_{2})}^{2} - \frac{1}{2}{U_{2}}^{2} + \frac{\partial\Phi_{2}}{\partial t} + gz\} ρ1​{21​(∇Φ1​)2−21​U1​2+∂t∂Φ1​​+gz}=ρ2​{21​(∇Φ2​)2−21​U2​2+∂t∂Φ2​​+gz}

线化方程

Φ1=U1x+Φ1′(z>ζ),Φ2=U2x+Φ2′(z<ζ){\Phi_{1} = U_{1}x + \Phi}_{1}^{'}(z > \zeta),\Phi_{2}{= U_{2}x + \Phi}_{2}^{'}(z < \zeta) Φ1​=U1​x+Φ1′​(z>ζ),Φ2​=U2​x+Φ2′​(z<ζ)

当交界面位移和斜率都很小，将方程线性化得到:

Δ  Φ1′=0(z>0),Δ Φ2′=0(z<0)\mathrm{\Delta}\ \ \Phi_{1}^{'} = 0(z > 0),\mathrm{\Delta}\ \Phi_{2}^{'} = 0(z < 0) Δ  Φ1′​=0(z>0),Δ Φ2′​=0(z<0)

ifz→±∞，∇ Φ′→0\quad z \to \pm \infty ， \nabla\ \Phi^{'} \to 0z→±∞，∇ Φ′→0

∂Φi′∂z=∂ζ∂t+Ui∂ζ∂x(z=0，i=1,2)\frac{\partial {\Phi_{i}}^{'}}{\partial z} = \frac{\partial \zeta}{\partial t} + U_{i}\frac{\partial \zeta}{\partial x} \quad (z = 0，i = 1,2) ∂z∂Φi​′​=∂t∂ζ​+Ui​∂x∂ζ​(z=0，i=1,2)

ρ1U1∂Φ1′∂x+∂Φ1′∂t+gζ)=ρ2(U2∂Φ2′∂x+∂Φ2′∂t+gζ)(z=0)\rho_{1}{U}_{1}\frac{\partial{\Phi_{1}}^{'}}{\partial x} + \frac{\partial{\Phi_{1}}^{'}}{\partial t} + g\zeta) = \rho_{2}\left( U_{2}\frac{\partial{\Phi_{2}}^{'}}{\partial x} + \frac{\partial{\Phi_{2}}^{'}}{\partial t} + g\zeta \right) \quad (z = 0) ρ1​U1​∂x∂Φ1​′​+∂t∂Φ1​′​+gζ)=ρ2​(U2​∂x∂Φ2​′​+∂t∂Φ2​′​+gζ)(z=0)

任意的扰动都可以分解成以下形式的独立模式：

(ζ，Φ1′，Φ2′)=(ζ^，Φ^1，Φ^2)ei(kx+ly)+st\left( \zeta ，{\Phi_{1}}^{'}，{\Phi_{2}}^{'} \right) = (\widehat{\zeta}，{\widehat{\Phi}}_{1}，{\widehat{\Phi}}_{2})e^{i(kx + ly) + st} (ζ，Φ1​′，Φ2​′)=(ζ​，Φ1​，Φ2​)ei(kx+ly)+st

代入方程：

Δ  Φ1′=0(z>0),Δ  Φ2′=0(z<0)\mathrm{\Delta}\ \ \Phi_{1}^{'} = 0(z > 0),\mathrm{\Delta}\ \ \Phi_{2}^{'} = 0(z < 0) Δ  Φ1′​=0(z>0),Δ  Φ2′​=0(z<0)

可以得到：

d2Φ^1dz2−l2Φ^1−k2Φ^1=0\frac{d^{2}{\widehat{\Phi}}_{1}}{dz^{2}} - l^{2}{\widehat{\Phi}}_{1} - k^{2}{\widehat{\Phi}}_{1} = 0 dz2d2Φ1​​−l2Φ1​−k2Φ1​=0

d2Φ^2dz2−l2Φ^2−k2Φ^2=0\frac{d^{2}{\widehat{\Phi}}_{2}}{dz^{2}} - l^{2}{\widehat{\Phi}}_{2} - k^{2}{\widehat{\Phi}}_{2} = 0 dz2d2Φ2​​−l2Φ2​−k2Φ2​=0

可以解得：

Φ^2=A2e−k~z+B2ek~z{\widehat{\Phi}}_{2} = A_{2}e^{- \widetilde{k}z} + B_{2}e^{\widetilde{k}z} Φ2​=A2​e−kz+B2​ekz

Φ^1=A1ek~z+B1e−k~z{\widehat{\Phi}}_{1} = A_{1}e^{\widetilde{k}z} + B_{1}e^{- \widetilde{k}z} Φ1​=A1​ekz+B1​e−kz

其中k~=(k2+l2)1/2\widetilde{k} = {(k^{2} + l^{2})}^{1/2}k=(k2+l2)1/2

再利用边界条件：当z→±∞z \to \pm \inftyz→±∞时，∇ Φ′→0\nabla\ \Phi^{'} \to 0∇ Φ′→0

Φ^2=A2e−k~z，Φ^1=A1ek~z{\widehat{\Phi}}_{2} = A_{2}e^{- \widetilde{k}z}，{\widehat{\Phi}}_{1} = A_{1}e^{\widetilde{k}z} Φ2​=A2​e−kz，Φ1​=A1​ekz

再根据

∂Φi′∂z=∂ζ∂t+Ui∂ζ∂x(z=0，i=1,2)\frac{\partial{\Phi_{i}}^{'}}{\partial z} = \frac{\partial\zeta}{\partial t} + U_{i}\frac{\partial\zeta}{\partial x} \quad (z = 0，i = 1,2) ∂z∂Φi​′​=∂t∂ζ​+Ui​∂x∂ζ​(z=0，i=1,2)

可以解得

A2=−(s+ikU2)ζ^/k~A1=(s+ikU1)ζ^/k~2\begin{alignat*}{2} A_{2} &= - (s + ikU_{2}) \widehat{\zeta}/ \widetilde{k} \\ A_{1} &= (s + ikU_{1}) \widehat{\zeta}/ \widetilde{k} \end{alignat*}{2} A2​A1​​=−(s+ikU2​)ζ​/k=(s+ikU1​)ζ​/k​2

根据方程

ρ1(U2∂Φ1′∂x+∂Φ1′∂t+gζ)=ρ2(U2∂Φ2′∂x+∂Φ2′∂t+gζ)(z=0)\rho_{1}{(U}_{2}\frac{\partial{\Phi_{1}}^{'}}{\partial x} + \frac{\partial{\Phi_{1}}^{'}}{\partial t} + g\zeta) = \rho_{2}\left( U_{2}\frac{\partial{\Phi_{2}}^{'}}{\partial x} + \frac{\partial{\Phi_{2}}^{'}}{\partial t} + g\zeta \right) \quad (z = 0) ρ1​(U2​∂x∂Φ1​′​+∂t∂Φ1​′​+gζ)=ρ2​(U2​∂x∂Φ2​′​+∂t∂Φ2​′​+gζ)(z=0)

得到特征值关系：

ρ1{k~g+(s+ikU1)2}=ρ2{k~g−(s+ikU2)2}\rho_{1}\left\{ \widetilde{k}g + \left( s + ikU_{1} \right)^{2} \right\} = \rho_{2}\{\widetilde{k}g - {(s + ikU_{2})}^{2}\} ρ1​{kg+(s+ikU1​)2}=ρ2​{kg−(s+ikU2​)2}

解出s

s=−ikρ1U1+ρ2U2ρ1−ρ2±{k2ρ1ρ2(U1−U2)2(ρ1+ρ2)2−k~g(ρ1−ρ2)ρ1+ρ2}1/2s = - ik\frac{\rho_{1}U_{1} + \rho_{2}U_{2}}{\rho_{1} - \rho_{2}} \pm \{\frac{k^{2}\rho_{1}\rho_{2}\left( U_{1} - U_{2} \right)^{2}}{\left( \rho_{1} + \rho_{2} \right)^{2}} - \frac{\widetilde{k}g(\rho_{1} - \rho_{2})}{\rho_{1} + \rho_{2}}\}^{1/2} s=−ikρ1​−ρ2​ρ1​U1​+ρ2​U2​​±{(ρ1​+ρ2​)2k2ρ1​ρ2​(U1​−U2​)2​−ρ1​+ρ2​kg(ρ1​−ρ2​)​}1/2

取U1=U2=0U_{1} = U_{2} = 0U1​=U2​=0
设系统以加速度作垂直方向的运动，并设向上为正，那么净加速度：

g′=g+fg^{'} = g + f g′=g+f

可得

s=±{k~g′(ρ1−ρ2)ρ1+ρ2}1/2s = \pm \{\frac{\widetilde{k}g^{'}(\rho_{1} - \rho_{2})}{\rho_{1} + \rho_{2}}\}^{1/2} s=±{ρ1​+ρ2​kg′(ρ1​−ρ2​)​}1/2

当g′(ρ1−ρ2)>0g^{'}\left( \rho_{1} - \rho_{2} \right) > 0g′(ρ1​−ρ2​)>0时不稳定（也就是说重流体在轻流体"上方"时不稳定）

增长率为：e{k~g′(ρ1−ρ2)ρ1+ρ2}1/2te^{\{\frac{\widetilde{k}g^{'}(\rho_{1} - \rho_{2})}{\rho_{1} + \rho_{2}}\}^{1/2}t}e{ρ1​+ρ2​kg′(ρ1​−ρ2​)​}1/2t

球坐标系中的分析

在球坐标系(r,θ,φ)中,交界面位于r=R处：
r>R,流体1,密度ρ1\rho_{1}ρ1​

r<R,流体2,密度ρ2\rho_{2}ρ2​

在球坐标系中

u=∇ϕ\mathbf{u} = \nabla\mathbf{\phi} u=∇ϕ

分量形式

vr=∂ϕ∂rervϕ=1r∂ϕ∂θeθvφ=1rsin⁡θ∂ϕ∂φeϕ\mathbf{v}_{r} = \frac{\partial\phi}{\partial r}\mathbf{e}_{r}\quad\mathbf{v}_{\phi} = \frac{1}{r}\frac{\partial\phi}{\partial\theta}\mathbf{e}_{\theta}\quad\mathbf{v}_{\varphi} = \frac{1}{r\sin\theta}\frac{\partial\phi}{\partial\varphi}\mathbf{e}_{\phi}vr​=∂r∂ϕ​er​vϕ​=r1​∂θ∂ϕ​eθ​vφ​=rsinθ1​∂φ∂ϕ​eϕ​

假设一个交界面上面的流体微元位置为(r,θ,φ)

在t时刻其位置可以表示为(R+ζ(θ,φ,t))

在t+δtt + \delta tt+δt时刻,其位置可以表示为(R+ζ(θ+δθ,φ+δφ,t+δt),φ+δφ,t+δt)(R+ζ(θ+\delta\theta,φ+ \delta\varphi,t+ \delta t),φ+ \delta\varphi,t+ \delta t)(R+ζ(θ+δθ,φ+δφ,t+δt),φ+δφ,t+δt)

那么可以得到

δr=R+ζ(θ+δθ,φ+δφ,t+δt)−(R+ζ(θ,φ,t))=∂ξ∂θδθ+∂ξ∂φδφ+∂ξ∂tδt=∂ξ∂θδθδt+∂ξ∂φδφδt+∂ξ∂t=∂ξ∂θVθr+∂ξ∂φVφrsin⁡θ+∂ξ∂t=∂ξ∂θ1r2∂ϕi∂θ+∂ξ∂φ1r2sin⁡2θ∂ϕi∂φ+∂ξ∂t\begin{alignat*}{6} \delta r & = R + \zeta(\theta + \delta\theta,\varphi + \delta\varphi,t + \delta t) - (R + \zeta(\theta,\varphi,t)) \\ &= \frac{\partial\xi}{\partial\theta}\delta\theta + \frac{\partial\xi}{\partial\varphi}\delta\varphi + \frac{\partial\xi}{\partial t}\delta t \\ &= \frac{\partial\xi}{\partial\theta}\frac{\delta\theta}{\delta t} + \frac{\partial\xi}{\partial\varphi}\frac{\delta\varphi}{\delta t} + \frac{\partial\xi}{\partial t} \\ &= \frac{\partial\xi}{\partial\theta}\frac{V_{\theta}}{r} + \frac{\partial\xi}{\partial\varphi}\frac{V_{\varphi}}{r\sin\theta} + \frac{\partial\xi}{\partial t} \\ & = \frac{\partial\xi}{\partial\theta}\frac{1}{r^{2}}\frac{\partial\phi_{i}}{\partial\theta} + \frac{\partial\xi}{\partial\varphi}\frac{1}{r^{2}\sin^{2}\theta}\frac{\partial\phi_{i}}{\partial\varphi} + \frac{\partial\xi}{\partial t} \end{alignat*} δr​=R+ζ(θ+δθ,φ+δφ,t+δt)−(R+ζ(θ,φ,t))=∂θ∂ξ​δθ+∂φ∂ξ​δφ+∂t∂ξ​δt=∂θ∂ξ​δtδθ​+∂φ∂ξ​δtδφ​+∂t∂ξ​=∂θ∂ξ​rVθ​​+∂φ∂ξ​rsinθVφ​​+∂t∂ξ​=∂θ∂ξ​r21​∂θ∂ϕi​​+∂φ∂ξ​r2sin2θ1​∂φ∂ϕi​​+∂t∂ξ​​

线化方程

∂Φi∂r∣r=R=∂ζ∂t\frac{\partial\Phi_{i}}{\partial r}|_{r = R} = \frac{\partial\zeta}{\partial t} ∂r∂Φi​​∣r=R​=∂t∂ζ​

不可压缩流体势函数满足拉普拉斯方程：

Δϕ1=0\Delta\phi_{1} = 0 Δϕ1​=0

Δϕ2=0\Delta\phi_{2} = 0 Δϕ2​=0

边界条件

初始扰动可以假设发生在有限区域内,因此在所有时间里,扰动都是有界的(有限的)。

事实上,当我们把方程从直角坐标系转移到球坐标系中的时候,需要补充原点处有界条件和周期性边界条件(否则我们得到的方程就不是适定的),在接下来的过程中会帮我们排除掉多值函数和原点为奇点的函数。

r→+∞,∇ϕ1→0r \to + \infty,\nabla\phi_{1} \to 0 r→+∞,∇ϕ1​→0

根据球坐标系下的伯努利方程：

∂ϕi∂t+12(∇ϕi)2−piρi+gr=Ci\frac{\partial\phi_{i}}{\partial t} + \frac{1}{2}(\nabla\phi_{i})^{2} - \frac{p_{i}}{\rho_{i}} + gr = C_{i} ∂t∂ϕi​​+21​(∇ϕi​)2−ρi​pi​​+gr=Ci​

有：

ρ1{C1−12(∇ϕ1)2−∂ϕ1∂t−gr}=ρ2{C2−12(∇ϕ2)2−∂ϕ2∂t−gr}(r=R+ζ)\rho_{1}\left\{ C_{1} - \frac{1}{2}(\nabla\phi_{1})^{2} - \frac{\partial\phi_{1}}{\partial t} - gr \right\} = \rho_{2}\left\{ C_{2} - \frac{1}{2}(\nabla\phi_{2})^{2} - \frac{\partial\phi_{2}}{\partial t} - gr \right\}\quad(r = R + \zeta) ρ1​{C1​−21​(∇ϕ1​)2−∂t∂ϕ1​​−gr}=ρ2​{C2​−21​(∇ϕ2​)2−∂t∂ϕ2​​−gr}(r=R+ζ)

初始时刻：

ρ1{C1−gR}=ρ2{C2−gR}\rho_{1}\left\{ C_{1} - gR \right\} = \rho_{2}\left\{ C_{2} - gR \right\} ρ1​{C1​−gR}=ρ2​{C2​−gR}

两式相减

ρ1{12(∇ϕ1)2+∂ϕ1∂t+gζ}=ρ2{12(∇ϕ2)2+∂ϕ2∂t+gζ}\rho_{1}\left\{ \frac{1}{2}(\nabla\phi_{1})^{2} + \frac{\partial\phi_{1}}{\partial t} + g\zeta \right\} = \rho_{2}\left\{ \frac{1}{2}(\nabla\phi_{2})^{2} + \frac{\partial\phi_{2}}{\partial t} + g\zeta \right\} ρ1​{21​(∇ϕ1​)2+∂t∂ϕ1​​+gζ}=ρ2​{21​(∇ϕ2​)2+∂t∂ϕ2​​+gζ}

线化方程

ρ1{∂ϕ1∂t+gζ}=ρ2{∂ϕ2∂t+gζ}(r=R)\rho_{1}\left\{ \frac{\partial\phi_{1}}{\partial t} + g\zeta \right\} = \rho_{2}\left\{ \frac{\partial\phi_{2}}{\partial t} + g\zeta \right\} \quad (r = R) ρ1​{∂t∂ϕ1​​+gζ}=ρ2​{∂t∂ϕ2​​+gζ}(r=R)

球坐标系中利用分离变量法可以得到：

r2d2Rdr2+2rdRdr−(l+1)R=0r^{2} \frac{d^{2}R}{dr^{2}} + 2r\frac{dR}{dr} - (l + 1)R = 0 r2dr2d2R​+2rdrdR​−(l+1)R=0

可以解得

R(r)=C1rl+C2rl+1R(r) = C_{1}r^{l} + \frac{C_{2}}{r^{l + 1}} R(r)=C1​rl+rl+1C2​​

因此可以设定

ζ=ζ^Ylm(θ,φ)est\zeta = \widehat{\zeta}{Y_{l}^{m}(\theta,\varphi)e}^{st} ζ=ζ​Ylm​(θ,φ)est

ϕ1=(A1rl+1+B1rl)Ylm(θ,φ)est\phi_{1} = {({\frac{A_{1}}{r^{l + 1}} + B_{1}}r^{l})Y_{l}^{m}}(\theta,\varphi)e^{st} ϕ1​=(rl+1A1​​+B1​rl)Ylm​(θ,φ)est

ϕ2=(B2rl+1+A2rl)Ylm(θ,φ)est\phi_{2} = ({\frac{B_{2}}{r^{l + 1}} + A_{2}}r^{l}){Y_{l}^{m}(\theta,\varphi)e}^{st} ϕ2​=(rl+1B2​​+A2​rl)Ylm​(θ,φ)est

根据

r→+∞,∇ϕ2→0r \to + \infty,\nabla\phi_{2} \to 0 r→+∞,∇ϕ2​→0

可得

B1=0B_{1} = 0 B1​=0

根据r=0时∇ϕ2\nabla\phi_{2}∇ϕ2​有界,可得

B2=0B_{2} = 0 B2​=0

因此

ϕ1=A1rl+1Ylm(θ,φ)est\phi_{1} = {\frac{A_{1}}{r^{l + 1}}Y_{l}^{m}(\theta,\varphi)e^{st}} ϕ1​=rl+1A1​​Ylm​(θ,φ)est

ϕ2=A2rlYlm(θ,φ)est\phi_{2} = A_{2}r^{l}{Y_{l}^{m}(\theta,\varphi)e}^{st} ϕ2​=A2​rlYlm​(θ,φ)est

再将势函数带入到速度连续方程中可得

A1=ζ^sRl+2l+1A2=ζ^sR1−ll\begin{alignat*}{} A_{1}&= \frac{\widehat{\zeta}sR^{l + 2}}{l + 1}\\ A_{2}&= \frac{\widehat{\zeta}sR^{1 - l}}{l} \end{alignat*} A1​A2​​=l+1ζ​sRl+2​=lζ​sR1−l​​

再将势函数带入压强连续方程可得

ρ1A1r−(l+1)Ylm(θ,φ)ests+ρ1gξ^Ylm(θ,φ)ests=ρ2A2rlYlm(θ,φ)ests+ρ2gξ^Ylm(θ,φ)est\begin{alignat*}{6} &\rho_{1}A_{1}r^{- (l + 1)}Y_{l}^{m}(\theta,\varphi)e^{st}s + \rho_{1}g\widehat{\xi}Y_{l}^{m}(\theta,\varphi)e^{st}s = \\ &\rho_{2}A_{2}r^{l}Y_{l}^{m}(\theta,\varphi)e^{st}s + \rho_{2}g\widehat{\xi}Y_{l}^{m}(\theta,\varphi)e^{st} \end{alignat*} ​ρ1​A1​r−(l+1)Ylm​(θ,φ)ests+ρ1​gξ​Ylm​(θ,φ)ests=ρ2​A2​rlYlm​(θ,φ)ests+ρ2​gξ​Ylm​(θ,φ)est​

ρ1R−(l+1)(−ξ^sRl+2l+1)s+ρ1gξ^=ρ2ξ^sR1−ll+ρ2gξ^\rho_{1}R^{- (l + 1)}\left( - \frac{\widehat{\xi}sR^{l + 2}}{l + 1} \right)s + \rho_{1}g\widehat{\xi} = \rho_{2}\frac{\widehat{\xi}sR^{1 - l}}{l} + \rho_{2}g\widehat{\xi} ρ1​R−(l+1)(−l+1ξ​sRl+2​)s+ρ1​gξ​=ρ2​lξ​sR1−l​+ρ2​gξ​

(ρ1−ρ2)g=(ρ2Rl+ρ1Rl+1)s2\left( \rho_{1} - \rho_{2} \right)g = \left( \frac{\rho_{2}R}{l} + \frac{\rho_{1}R}{l + 1} \right)s^{2} (ρ1​−ρ2​)g=(lρ2​R​+l+1ρ1​R​)s2

可以解得

s=±{l(l+1)(ρ1−ρ2)g(lρ1+(l+1)ρ2)R}1/2s = \pm \{\frac{l(l + 1)(\rho_{1} - \rho_{2})g}{(l\rho_{1} + (l + 1)\rho_{2})R}\}^{1/2} s=±{(lρ1​+(l+1)ρ2​)Rl(l+1)(ρ1​−ρ2​)g​}1/2

因此当外层流体密度ρ1>ρ2\rho_{1} > \rho_{2}ρ1​>ρ2​时,不稳定

增长率为：

γ=l(l+1)(ρ1−ρ2)g(lρ1+(l+1)ρ2)R\gamma = \sqrt{\frac{l(l + 1)(\rho_{1} - \rho_{2})g}{(l\rho_{1} + (l + 1)\rho_{2})R}} γ=(lρ1​+(l+1)ρ2​)Rl(l+1)(ρ1​−ρ2​)g​​

Φt=1T(1−u)(1−v4)d2Tdt2\Phi_{t}=\frac{1}{T}(1 - u)(1 -\frac{v}{4})\frac{d^{2}T}{dt^{2}} Φt​=T1​(1−u)(1−4v​)dt2d2T​

Φz2=1T2(1−2u)(1−v2)(dTdt)2{\Phi_{z}}^{2}=\frac{1}{T^{2}}(1 - 2u)(1 -\frac{v}{2})(\frac{dT}{dt})^{2} Φz​2=T21​(1−2u)(1−2v​)(dtdT​)2

Φr2=1T2(1−2u)(1−v2)v4(dTdt)2\Phi_{r}^{2}=\frac{1}{T^{2}}(1 - 2u)(1 -\frac{v}{2})\frac{v}{4}(\frac{dT}{dt})^{2} Φr2​=T21​(1−2u)(1−2v​)4v​(dtdT​)2

因此伯努利方程里v的系数为
